<p>POSITION SUMMARY: With direct supervision, this role performs a variety of routine billing functions to ensure the proper preparation of accurate and timely bills to customers based on service contract terms and also is responsible for related activities.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Following standard operating procedures, this role prepares monthly billing adjustments, obtains required approvals and enters adjustments into the billing system.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Researches and resolves routine billing questions and discrepancies. Refers unusual problems to higher level personnel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews invoices for completeness and accuracy. Follows up with customers or other division staff\u002Fmanagement to resolve identified discrepancies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May calculate and prepare basic manual billings for non-complex billing arrangements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May gather and summarize supplemental billing information to accommodate customer billing requirements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May review various billing system reports to identify billing discrepancies. Makes corrections as appropriate to ensure accurate billing following standard operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts cash receipts to customer accounts based on information from lock box reports and local cash receipt listings. Performs basic and routine research to resolve differences or unidentified payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts payments as appropriate into the billing system to clear open obligations, or prepares remittance advices to accompany payments sent to the lock box or corporate office.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May accept credit card payment from customers over the phone and process recurring payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May complete customer set up in company billing system(s).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May have limited contact with customers to assist with researching billing questions and providing copies of the support documentation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Some related accounting or office experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Directly related experience in which incumbents have worked with customers in a billing function.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A good knowledge and understanding of billing transactions and processes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Should have basic MS Excel skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrated ability to follow standard operating procedures and instructions to complete tasks in a timely and accurate manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> The ability to effectively interact and communicate with division managers as well as customers in a professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Must be able to demonstrate initiative to thoughtfully research and follow up on non-standard situations to ensure compliance with company policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good math aptitude and the ability to work accurately with numbers are essential.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> High <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: With direct supervision, this role performs a variety of routine billing functions to ensure the proper preparation of accurate and timely bills to customers based on service contract terms and also is responsible for related activities.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Following standard operating procedures, this role prepares monthly billing adjustments, obtains required approvals and enters adjustments into the billing system.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Researches and resolves routine billing questions and discrepancies. Refers unusual problems to higher level personnel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews invoices for completeness and accuracy. Follows up with customers or other division staff\u002Fmanagement to resolve identified discrepancies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May calculate and prepare basic manual billings for non-complex billing arrangements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May gather and summarize supplemental billing information to accommodate customer billing requirements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May review various billing system reports to identify billing discrepancies. Makes corrections as appropriate to ensure accurate billing following standard operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts cash receipts to customer accounts based on information from lock box reports and local cash receipt listings. Performs basic and routine research to resolve differences or unidentified payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts payments as appropriate into the billing system to clear open obligations, or prepares remittance advices to accompany payments sent to the lock box or corporate office.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May accept credit card payment from customers over the phone and process recurring payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May complete customer set up in company billing system(s).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May have limited contact with customers to assist with researching billing questions and providing copies of the support documentation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Some related accounting or office experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Directly related experience in which incumbents have worked with customers in a billing function.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A good knowledge and understanding of billing transactions and processes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Should have basic MS Excel skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrated ability to follow standard operating procedures and instructions to complete tasks in a timely and accurate manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> The ability to effectively interact and communicate with division managers as well as customers in a professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Must be able to demonstrate initiative to thoughtfully research and follow up on non-standard situations to ensure compliance with company policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good math aptitude and the ability to work accurately with numbers are essential.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or G.E.D. certification.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: With direct supervision, this role performs a variety of routine billing functions to ensure the proper preparation of accurate and timely bills to customers based on service contract terms and also is responsible for related activities.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Following standard operating procedures, this role prepares monthly billing adjustments, obtains required approvals and enters adjustments into the billing system.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Researches and resolves routine billing questions and discrepancies. Refers unusual problems to higher level personnel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews invoices for completeness and accuracy. Follows up with customers or other division staff\u002Fmanagement to resolve identified discrepancies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May calculate and prepare basic manual billings for non-complex billing arrangements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May gather and summarize supplemental billing information to accommodate customer billing requirements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May review various billing system reports to identify billing discrepancies. Makes corrections as appropriate to ensure accurate billing following standard operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts cash receipts to customer accounts based on information from lock box reports and local cash receipt listings. Performs basic and routine research to resolve differences or unidentified payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts payments as appropriate into the billing system to clear open obligations, or prepares remittance advices to accompany payments sent to the lock box or corporate office.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May accept credit card payment from customers over the phone and process recurring payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May complete customer set up in company billing system(s).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May have limited contact with customers to assist with researching billing questions and providing copies of the support documentation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> QUALIFICATIONS:\n <ul>\n  <li> Some related accounting or office experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Directly related experience in which incumbents have worked with customers in a billing function.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A good knowledge and understanding of billing transactions and processes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Should have basic MS Excel skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrated ability to follow standard operating procedures and instructions to complete tasks in a timely and accurate manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> The ability to effectively interact and communicate with division managers as well as customers in a professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Must be able to demonstrate initiative to thoughtfully research and follow up on non-standard situations to ensure compliance with company policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good math aptitude and the ability to work accurately with numbers are essential.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or G.E.D. certification.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>$49,920 - $50,000 per year with full benefits. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: A Laborer is responsible for safely and efficiently performing general labor duties at a hauling company, transfer station, recycling center or landfill. Responsibilities may include such things as yard clean-up, fueling vehicles and equipment, general vehicle operation, general office maintenance and other related duties.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Safely and efficiently perform assigned responsibilities to include such duties as: o Clean up work areas; o Fuel vehicles and equipment; o Clean track on track type and related equipment; o Perform yard work, including mowing and paper pick up; o Operate general site vehicles and equipment, such as water trucks, pick up trucks, sweepers, mowers, trimming equipment, etc.; o Perform general office maintenance and repairs, including painting and janitorial work; o Install temporary wind fences, as required; o Direct traffic at the site as necessary; and o Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Maintenance Clerk provides administrative support to the maintenance function.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBLITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Assures the availability of parts in a cost-effective manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains fleet records on inventory levels, preventive maintenance schedules, and corrective maintenance performed on all units.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Inputs fleet information into the computerized fleet management system daily.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May act as a point of contact with vendors to order, receive and ensure payment for goods and services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Prepares truck purchase orders for management approval, including assignment of general ledger codes. Utilizes ePro to process transactions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Receives, tags, stocks and dispenses parts to mechanics according to Corporate and Regional policy and local operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews purchase orders with accounting to ensure accuracy and proper payment of invoices.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Produces various productivity and usage reports for management review.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follows all safety policies and procedures; participates with the team to achieve safety goals<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reconciles Dossier financial data to Lawson general ledger.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Supports the Fleet Manager with analysis of fleet operations reports. This includes analyzing data, identifying trends and outliers, and correcting mistakes where appropriate. Resolves data errors and escalates others errors to management for comparison against identified critical objectives and standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May assist with the parts organization and inventory.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Related experience in a maintenance \u002F trucking industry.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or G.E.D.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1 year of general office experience or equivalent training.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. TheDriver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. TheDriver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: With direct supervision, this role performs a variety of routine billing functions to ensure the proper preparation of accurate and timely bills to customers based on service contract terms and also is responsible for related activities.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Following standard operating procedures, this role prepares monthly billing adjustments, obtains required approvals and enters adjustments into the billing system.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Researches and resolves routine billing questions and discrepancies. Refers unusual problems to higher level personnel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews invoices for completeness and accuracy. Follows up with customers or other division staff\u002Fmanagement to resolve identified discrepancies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May calculate and prepare basic manual billings for non-complex billing arrangements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May gather and summarize supplemental billing information to accommodate customer billing requirements.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May review various billing system reports to identify billing discrepancies. Makes corrections as appropriate to ensure accurate billing following standard operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts cash receipts to customer accounts based on information from lock box reports and local cash receipt listings. Performs basic and routine research to resolve differences or unidentified payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Posts payments as appropriate into the billing system to clear open obligations, or prepares remittance advices to accompany payments sent to the lock box or corporate office.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May accept credit card payment from customers over the phone and process recurring payments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May complete customer set up in company billing system(s).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May have limited contact with customers to assist with researching billing questions and providing copies of the support documentation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> QUALIFICATIONS:\n <ul>\n  <li> Some related accounting or office experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Directly related experience in which incumbents have worked with customers in a billing function.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A good knowledge and understanding of billing transactions and processes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Should have basic MS Excel skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrated ability to follow standard operating procedures and instructions to complete tasks in a timely and accurate manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> The ability to effectively interact and communicate with division managers as well as customers in a professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Must be able to demonstrate initiative to thoughtfully research and follow up on non-standard situations to ensure compliance with company policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good math aptitude and the ability to work accurately with numbers are essential.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or G.E.D. certification.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>$49,920 - $50,000 per year with full benefits. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. TheDriver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: A Driver Trainee will be trained by Republic Services to obtain a commercial driver’s license (CDL) to then assume the responsibility of a Driver with our Company. Driver Trainees will complete a comprehensive training program and be given the resources to take the CDL examination. Once the Driver Trainee completes the program and obtains a CDL, he\u002Fshe will be placed into an open Driver position in one of the Company’s lines of business, including but not limited to, Residential, Commercial, Industrial or Roll-Off.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Successfully complete Republic Services’ CDL training program, which includes classroom study, on-route training, driving experience, and resources (including the loan of a truck) necessary to take and pass the state CDL examination.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Complete twelve (12) full months of employment with Republic Services after obtaining a CDL.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the assigned vehicle in accordance with Company policy to ensure tire pressure, fluid levels, safety equipment, gauges, and controls are in proper working order. Report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to safely operate a heavy or commercial truck along a designated route and to the disposal site; read route sheet, follow map and service each customer as identified on the route sheet or as assigned by the dispatcher and\u002For supervisor.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to operate manual and\u002For automatic controls in accordance with Company safety policies and procedures to lift and load refuse, operate compactor and dispose of collected material at the designated facility.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to identify unsatisfactory waste containers and tag containers in accordance with applicable departmental procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor the condition of any assigned vehicle to ensure it is operationally ready at all times to minimize down time; clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> After obtaining a CDL, perform all responsibilities of a Driver in one of the Company’s lines of business (i.e., Residential, Commercial, Industrial, Roll-Off).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Current CDL or CDL permit.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> No prohibitions to acquiring a commercial drivers’ license.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Sorter is responsible for safely and efficiently processing incoming recyclable materials so that outbound commodities are acceptable for sale to various brokers or mills.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Sort and segregate recoverable materials (e.g., aluminum, plastic, glass, paper, etc.) from incoming waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Deposit recoverable materials safely and efficiently into appropriate chute.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Assist other sorters on an as-needed basis with heavy or bulky items.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all Company safety policies and procedures, including stopping the conveyor belt in emergency situations.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Inspect incoming loads for unacceptable waste; remove unacceptable items as required.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Communicate with equipment operators regarding incoming loads of special waste or other loads that require special attention.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Previous experience working in a Recycling Facility sorting recyclable materials.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> TOTAL BASE PAY - $20.64 -$20.64 per hour<\u002Fp>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. TheDriver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper I rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Commercial Helper I is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of relevant work experience preferred.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Sort and segregate recoverable materials (e.g., aluminum, plastic, glass, paper, etc.) from incoming waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Deposit <p>POSITION SUMMARY: Within a division, the Operations Supervisor – Landfill is responsible for supervising a team of Lead Operators, Operators and\u002For General Laborers who contribute to the efficient operation of the landfill. The Operations Supervisor – Landfill is responsible for ensuring that fill sequencing plans are adhered to, density goals are achieved and that the landfill is operated in a manner consistent with the stipulated applicable permit. The Operations Supervisor works with the Operations Manager and General Manager to implement tactical initiatives to drive functional excellence and budget achievement. The Operations Supervisor ensures adherence to all accident prevention programs and leads operations to ensure compliance with all safety, environmental, operating, regulatory, accounting, ethics and other standards. Responsibilities include the execution and delivery of Safety, Customer Experience, and Efficiency while supporting a culture of employee engagement.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBLITIES:<br> Safety<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Understand and provider leadership to achieve and communicate about safety goals and objectives. • Work to remove unsafe conditions or situations from or related to the landfill.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Partner with the maintenance department to ensure all equipment remains in working order and in compliance with safety standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Oversee effective safety and accident prevention programs to ensure all reasonable actions are taken to prevent accidents and injuries; ensure a safe and productive work environment for all employees; implement and maintain and effective loss control and safety program.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Engage assigned employees in active participation to instill a culture of safety by demonstration of a personal commitment to safe operations and active personal outreach to operational employees.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> Customer Experience<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Provide service to all customers that meets or exceeds customer expectations with regard to the entire customer experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Resolve unusual service requests, equipment breakdowns and schedule changes with timely communications to all stakeholders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interact with customers to solve and rectify any issues and improve the overall customer experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Serve as a positive representative of the Company to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty to the Company.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> Efficiency<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Establish productivity goals where needed; ensure adherence to operating standards; and manage labor hours and disposal expenses per established and agreed plans.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Execute other operational plans to help achieve or exceed the division’s budgeted goals.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Understand, support and execute service delivery while actively supporting maintenance and the operational role in fleet quality and maintenance.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> Employee Engagement<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Create a collaborative, communicative team environment and drive employee engagement with the Company.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Build and develop talent on the team, understand employees’ career goals and provide coaching to get employees ready for advancement with the Company.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job related duties as needed or assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Able to direct large staff.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Is process-oriented and results-oriented in setting and pursuing aggressive goals, demonstrating a strong commitment to organizational success and marshaling resources to accomplish goals and objectives.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrated problem-solving, analytical, critical-thinking and decision-making skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Is collaborative; builds and works with teams.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Creative thinker who challenges conventional solutions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates and promotes ethical behavior.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Has strong leadership skills and proven judgment of talent, with an emphasis on hiring and developing high performance teams.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Participation in the Company’s management trainee program.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Bachelor’s degree in a business related field.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience in labor relations.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> State certification as required by regulation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Minimum of 1 year of lead or supervisory experience.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <b>Salary Range:<\u002Fb> $66,976.00 - $100,464.00\n <br> \n <b>Bonus Plan Details (if applicable):<\u002Fb> Bonus - MIP, 10% Annual\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together.
