<p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Operator – Heavy Equipment is responsible for the safe operation of heavy equipment at a recycling center, landfill or transfer station for the purpose of transferring, spreading, covering, loading and\u002For compacting waste or soil in an efficient and safe manner.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform pre- and post-operation inspection of the equipment in accordance with Company policy to ensure windows, lights, mirrors and rear view camera are clean. Safely and efficiently operate equipment that may include: forklift, excavator, bulldozer, front-end loader and other equipment using proper safety standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste in materials.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor the condition of the equipment to ensure it is operationally ready at all times to minimize down time; clean tracks or wheels on equipment, as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform and document minor service on equipment, referring more complicated mechanical issues to Maintenance Shop for repair.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Complete Equipment Condition Report and other reports, as necessary; report any necessary repairs to supervisor, as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensure that shop is clean, serviced and stored at the completion of each shift.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good time management skills to ensure assigned responsibilities are completed in an efficient and safe manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of prior related experience in heavy equipment operation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> One year of prior experience working at sites regulated by OSHA.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. customers on different routes and schedules.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Load\u002Funload waste and\u002For recycling materials at landfills, recycling centers, or similar facilities.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform pre- and post-trip inspection of your vehicle to ensure truck is in proper working order and address maintenance issues quickly.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and report any safety or employee experience issues to leadership.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b><br> What you will need to be successful:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Class B or higher Commercial Driver’s <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Maintenance Clerk provides administrative support to the maintenance function.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBLITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Assures the availability of parts in a cost-effective manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains fleet records on inventory levels, preventive maintenance schedules, and corrective maintenance performed on all units.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Inputs fleet information into the computerized fleet management system daily.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May act as a point of contact with vendors to order, receive and ensure payment for goods and services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Prepares truck purchase orders for management approval, including assignment of general ledger codes. Utilizes ePro to process transactions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Receives, tags, stocks and dispenses parts to mechanics according to Corporate and Regional policy and local operating procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reviews purchase orders with accounting to ensure accuracy and proper payment of invoices.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Produces various productivity and usage reports for management review.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follows all safety policies and procedures; participates with the team to achieve safety goals<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reconciles Dossier financial data to Lawson general ledger.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Supports the Fleet Manager with analysis of fleet operations reports. This includes analyzing data, identifying trends and outliers, and correcting mistakes where appropriate. Resolves data errors and escalates others errors to management for comparison against identified critical objectives and standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> May assist with the parts organization and inventory.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Related experience in a maintenance \u002F trucking industry.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or G.E.D.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 1 year of general office experience or equivalent training.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Commercial Helper II (CDL) rides on and\u002For drives the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers on a designated route. The Commercial Helper II (CDL) is responsible for safely driving, loading waste and poly carts, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position also assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the route and work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Rides on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route and also drives the vehicle as necessary to complete the route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Climbs on and off vehicle to load refuse, waste and poly carts; lifts and carries trash bags and containers to the truck for disposal.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operates packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Assists Driver is safely operating the vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Cleans waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; sprays and cleans the hopper and truck.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; reports any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interacts with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitors waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Cleans area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are service in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follows all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Actively participates in the Company’s ReSOP program.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Performs other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Minimum of 2 years of prior experience working around commercial trucks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Commercial Drivers License<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <b>Hourly Range:<\u002Fb> $14.00 - $20.00\n <br> \n <b>Bonus Plan Details (if applicable):<\u002Fb>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: A Driver Trainee will be trained by Republic Services to obtain a commercial driver’s license (CDL) to then assume the responsibility of a Driver with our Company. Driver Trainees will complete a comprehensive training program and be given the resources to take the CDL examination. Once the Driver Trainee completes the program and obtains a CDL, he\u002Fshe will be placed into an open Driver position in one of the Company’s lines of business, including but not limited to, Residential, Commercial, Industrial or Roll-Off.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Successfully complete Republic Services’ CDL training program, which includes classroom study, on-route training, driving experience, and resources (including the loan of a truck) necessary to take and pass the state CDL examination.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Complete twelve (12) full months of employment with Republic Services after obtaining a CDL.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the assigned vehicle in accordance with Company policy to ensure tire pressure, fluid levels, safety equipment, gauges, and controls are in proper working order. Report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to safely operate a heavy or commercial truck along a designated route and to the disposal site; read route sheet, follow map and service each customer as identified on the route sheet or as assigned by the dispatcher and\u002For supervisor.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to operate manual and\u002For automatic controls in accordance with Company safety policies and procedures to lift and load refuse, operate compactor and dispose of collected material at the designated facility.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to identify unsatisfactory waste containers and tag containers in accordance with applicable departmental procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Learn to continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor the condition of any assigned vehicle to ensure it is operationally ready at all times to minimize down time; clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> After obtaining a CDL, perform all responsibilities of a Driver in one of the Company’s lines of business (i.e., Residential, Commercial, Industrial, Roll-Off).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Current CDL or CDL permit.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> No prohibitions to acquiring a commercial drivers’ license.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Operator – Heavy Equipment is responsible for the safe operation of heavy equipment at a recycling center, landfill or transfer station for the purpose of transferring, spreading, covering, loading and\u002For compacting waste or soil in an efficient and safe manner.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform pre- and post-operation inspection of the equipment in accordance with Company policy to ensure windows, lights, mirrors and rear view camera are clean. Safely and efficiently operate equipment that may include: forklift, excavator, bulldozer, front-end loader and other equipment using proper safety standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste in materials.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor the condition of the equipment to ensure it is operationally ready at all times to minimize down time; clean tracks or wheels on equipment, as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform and document minor service on equipment, referring more complicated mechanical issues to Maintenance Shop for repair.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Complete Equipment Condition Report and other reports, as necessary; report any necessary repairs to supervisor, as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ensure that shop is clean, serviced and stored at the completion of each shift.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintains a feeling of pride in work; strives to achieve all goals.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Two years of prior related experience in heavy equipment operation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> One year of prior experience working at sites regulated by OSHA.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p><b>Operations Supervisor<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p> As an Operations Supervisor at Republic Services, you are responsible for the safety and well-being of the most important asset at our company – our employees. As a people leader, you will have the chance to solve problems, create opportunities and deliver exceptional service to our customers and communities. As a key member of the leadership team, you will both understand the big picture of where we are going as a company, while being hands-on in the day-to-day operation to make it happen.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Attract, hire, lead and develop a diverse team of Drivers, Helpers, and\u002For Dispatchers.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Prioritize safety through accident prevention programs, including accountability for safe behaviors, conducting safety meetings, and maintaining a safety focused culture.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Optimize our business by creating, modifying, and improving routes to maximize efficiency.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Gather and review customer feedback to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty to the Company Provide coaching, feedback, and exposure to challenging assignments for team members.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Collaborate frequently with colleagues across departments, such as sales and maintenance teams, to ensure business and operational goals are achieved.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Implement engagement programs to attract new employees and drive existing employee loyalty, satisfaction, and retention.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Establish productivity goals where needed, ensure adherence to operating standards, and manage labor hours and expenses closely.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will need to be successful:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Previous knowledge or experience of leading in a safety-focused environment preferred.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Capacity to lead diverse teams of individuals to perform at their best.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ability to drive a company vehicle and work outside in all weather conditions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to problem solve, use good judgment, and make sound decisions efficiently.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Flexibility to adapt to changes as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong communication skills to interact with customers and colleagues with respect.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A high degree of ethics and integrity to do the right thing in the right way.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Comfort using technology (i.e., Microsoft Office, App-Based Software, Web-Based Software).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Desire to help others and be a team player.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b><br> Why you will love this job!<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will have the ability to make a positive impact on the company and team by creating opportunities for our colleagues to serve our communities at their best.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will get the chance to take ownership of important priorities and flex your leadership muscle.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be a part of a team that has earned awards such as “Most Admired Company of 2021”.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will stay active and engaged with your team, your customers, and our communities - shifting between office and field throughout the day.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be provided all required PPE, including work boots and all-weather gear.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work for a company that cares about you, with great benefits and offerings to keep you healthy, safe, and well.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work alongside diverse colleagues who are committed to serving our customers and communities together.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will be given the chance to provide feedback in our inclusive culture, through regular interaction with leadership and our confidential employee experience survey.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <b>Hourly Range:<\u002Fb> $14.00 - $20.00\n <br> \n <b>Bonus Plan Details (if applicable):<\u002Fb>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p><b>Operations Supervisor<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p> As an Operations Supervisor at Republic Services, you are responsible for the safety and well-being of the most important asset at our company – our employees. As a people leader, you will have the chance to solve problems, create opportunities and deliver exceptional service to our customers and communities. As a key member of the leadership team, you will both understand the big picture of where we are going as a company, while being hands-on in the day-to-day operation to make it happen.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Attract, hire, lead and develop a diverse team of Drivers, Helpers, and\u002For Dispatchers.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Prioritize safety through accident prevention programs, including accountability for safe behaviors, conducting safety meetings, and maintaining a safety focused culture.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Optimize our business by creating, modifying, and improving routes to maximize efficiency.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Gather and review customer feedback to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty to the Company Provide coaching, feedback, and exposure to challenging assignments for team members.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Collaborate frequently with colleagues across departments, such as sales and maintenance teams, to ensure business and operational goals are achieved.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Implement engagement programs to attract new employees and drive existing employee loyalty, satisfaction, and retention.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Establish productivity goals where needed, ensure adherence to operating standards, and manage labor hours and expenses closely.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will need to be successful:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Previous knowledge or experience of leading in a safety-focused environment preferred.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Capacity to lead diverse teams of individuals to perform at their best.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ability to drive a company vehicle and work outside in all weather conditions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to problem solve, use good judgment, and make sound decisions efficiently.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Flexibility to adapt to changes as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong communication skills to interact with customers and colleagues with respect.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A high degree of ethics and integrity to do the right thing in the right way.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Comfort using technology (i.e., Microsoft Office, App-Based Software, Web-Based Software).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Desire to help others and be a team player.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b><br> Why you will love this job!<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will have the ability to make a positive impact on the company and team by creating opportunities for our colleagues to serve our communities at their best.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will get the chance to take ownership of important priorities and flex your leadership muscle.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be a part of a team that has earned awards such as “Most Admired Company of 2021”.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will stay active and engaged with your team, your customers, and our communities - shifting between office and field throughout the day.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be provided all required PPE, including work boots and all-weather gear.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work for a company that cares about you, with great benefits and offerings to keep you healthy, safe, and well.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work alongside diverse colleagues who are committed to serving our customers and communities together.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will be given the chance to provide feedback in our inclusive culture, through regular interaction with leadership and our confidential employee experience survey.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. Ensure that the highest levels of safety and environmental standards are being achieved.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform routine analytical testing per company Waste Analysis Plan on incoming and outgoing bulk loads, containerized waste shipments and customers’ samples.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Prepare reagents and standards to specifications as necessary.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Order and keep track of lab supplies as needed, including reagents, solvents, analytical gases, consumable testing supplies and sample bottles.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform data-entry record keeping functions in the laboratory, including routine analytical results and weekly or special reporting information.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform data-entry quality control functions in the laboratory and for the facility, including routine quality assurance documents.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Interpret lab and QC results to create Analytical Discrepancy (ADS) documents in ERP system. <p><b>Operations Supervisor<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p> As an Operations Supervisor at Republic Services, you are responsible for the safety and well-being of the most important asset at our company – our employees. As a people leader, you will have the chance to solve problems, create opportunities and deliver exceptional service to our customers and communities. As a key member of the leadership team, you will both understand the big picture of where we are going as a company, while being hands-on in the day-to-day operation to make it happen.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Attract, hire, lead and develop a diverse team of Drivers, Helpers, and\u002For Dispatchers.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Prioritize safety through accident prevention programs, including accountability for safe behaviors, conducting safety meetings, and maintaining a safety focused culture.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Optimize our business by creating, modifying, and improving routes to maximize efficiency.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Gather and review customer feedback to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty to the Company Provide coaching, feedback, and exposure to challenging assignments for team members.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Collaborate frequently with colleagues across departments, such as sales and maintenance teams, to ensure business and operational goals are achieved.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Implement engagement programs to attract new employees and drive existing employee loyalty, satisfaction, and retention.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Establish productivity goals where needed, ensure adherence to operating standards, and manage labor hours and expenses closely.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> What you will need to be successful:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Previous knowledge or experience of leading in a safety-focused environment preferred.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Capacity to lead diverse teams of individuals to perform at their best.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ability to drive a company vehicle and work outside in all weather conditions.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to problem solve, use good judgment, and make sound decisions efficiently.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Flexibility to adapt to changes as needed.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Strong communication skills to interact with customers and colleagues with respect.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> A high degree of ethics and integrity to do the right thing in the right way.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Comfort using technology (i.e., Microsoft Office, App-Based Software, Web-Based Software).<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Desire to help others and be a team player.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b><br> Why you will love this job!<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will have the ability to make a positive impact on the company and team by creating opportunities for our colleagues to serve our communities at their best.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will get the chance to take ownership of important priorities and flex your leadership muscle.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be a part of a team that has earned awards such as “Most Admired Company of 2021”.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will stay active and engaged with your team, your customers, and our communities - shifting between office and field throughout the day.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will be provided all required PPE, including work boots and all-weather gear.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work for a company that cares about you, with great benefits and offerings to keep you healthy, safe, and well.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> You will work alongside diverse colleagues who are committed to serving our customers and communities together.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <ul>\n  <li> You will be given the chance to provide feedback in our inclusive culture, through regular interaction with leadership and our confidential employee experience survey.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. Our people provide an essential service, serving and impacting customers, neighborhoods, and communities everywhere.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> As a company, we are proud of our values and encourage those who share in our aspirations to join our team:<\u002Fb><br> · We protect our colleagues and communities through safe practices everywhere, every day.<br> · We are committed to serving our customers and communities by going above and beyond to exceed expectations.<br> · We take action to improve neighborhoods and communities by being environmentally responsible and creating a more sustainable world.<br> · We are driven to deliver results in the right way.<br> · We encourage a human centered culture that honors the unique potential and dignity of every person.<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p>Republic Services is an equal opportunity employer. <p>Monday-Friday, Saturdays as needed 1st shift $18\u002Fhr DOE<\u002Fp>\n <p><br> POSITION SUMMARY: The Driver Helper rides on the vehicle and assists a Driver in providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route. The Driver Helper is responsible for safely loading waste, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the on the route and in the work area.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ride on the vehicle to assist the Driver while servicing customers on a designated route.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Operate packing mechanism and various levers and handles to activate the lifting and loading mechanism<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean waste from the packer blade and truck body on each disposal trip; spray and clean the hopper and truck, if applicable.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle in accordance with Company policy; report any safety issues on standard reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Courteously interact with all customers, dispatchers and others on a daily basis to ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Clean area around an accidental waste spill, ensuring adherence to all applicable safety standards and policies.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Maintain adherence to required productivity standards for the department to ensure all customers are serviced in a timely and efficient manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>Monday-Friday, Saturdays as needed<br> 1st shift<br> $18\u002Fhr DOE<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: The Forklift Operator is responsible for the safe operation of the forklift. For the purpose of stacking material, loading of trailers, and emptying full containers throughout the facility in an efficient and safe manner.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Perform pre- and post-operation inspection of the equipment in accordance with Company policy to ensure windows, lights, mirrors are clean, and equipment is in proper operating condition.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Reports to shift supervisor for daily work assignments.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Responsible for loading of trailers safely and efficiently.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Responsible for organizing material in the warehouse.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Coordinates with supervisor to empty full containers and trash bins throughout the day in and around the facility.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Continuously monitor the condition of the equipment to ensure it is operationally ready at all times to minimize down time.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Follow all required safety policies and procedures.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Must complete and pass OSHA's requirements for forklift certification (powered industrial truck) training as set forth in 29 CFR 1910.178.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good customer services skills to meet and exceed customer expectations; acts in a professional, courteous and cooperative manner toward customers and co-workers; works with a sense of honesty and trustworthiness.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good time management skills to ensure assigned responsibilities are completed in an efficient and safe manner.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Good follow through ability; ability to adhere to work schedule and follows through on challenges as they arise.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to adhere to Company policies and rules set forth; promotes the Company’s safety standards; does not take inappropriate risks.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Minimum of 1 year of prior related experience in forklift operation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Minimum 1 year of prior experience working at sites regulated by OSHA.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together. <p>POSITION SUMMARY: A Laborer is responsible for safely and efficiently performing general labor duties at a hauling company, transfer station, recycling center or landfill. Responsibilities may include such things as yard clean-up, fueling vehicles and equipment, general vehicle operation, general office maintenance and other related duties.<br> <br> PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Safely and efficiently perform assigned responsibilities to include such duties as: o Clean up work areas; o Fuel vehicles and equipment; o Clean track on track type and related equipment; o Perform yard work, including mowing and paper pick up; o Operate general site vehicles and equipment, such as water trucks, pick up trucks, sweepers, mowers, trimming equipment, etc.; o Perform general office maintenance and repairs, including painting and janitorial work; o Install temporary wind fences, as required; o Direct traffic at the site as necessary; and o Perform other job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <br> \n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b>Why choose Republic?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b> Joining Republic isn’t just about taking on a new job, it’s about making a commitment to create a more sustainable world together.
